title: DraftDaySports Pro Basketball 3 v1.7 Patch  [SoN]
description:
Game: DraftDaySports Pro Basketball 3
Version: 1.7
Coded: October 5, 2014 by gone of SoN
Type: Patch

Description: You will not find a more authentic and accurate pro basketball simulation than DDS:PB3!

Instructions: Install the game as normal (version 1.7). Copy the 2 files in this crack folder ("DDSPB3 v1.7 Patch - SoN.exe" and "Mono.Cecil.dll") to the installed DDSPB3 folder. Execute "DDSPB3 v1.3 Patch - SoN.exe" and that's it. I know this is our first release which includes a DLL but it's our first patch for a .NET program and the DLL is needed to run the patch. Both files can be deleted once the patch is applied if you so choose. Thanks for understanding.

Notes: Thanks for testing, Raven. If anyone can find his duck it would be greatly appreciated.
